search.title: Month in review: October 2023
search.text: month review: october 2023 inspired by melanie richardsâ€™ learning logs â€™m starting this series document things that happened each month reason calling â€œlearning logsâ€ feel very productive selfimprovement area most time â€œmonth reviewâ€ seems lighter â€™ll try best remember what did keep going promises thoughoctober started with wife making down payment our new apartment are still waiting bank finish their part paperwork all goes well should have home around end november fabio haag type team from left right: eduilson coan sofia mohr ana laydner haagaround middle there team meetup formal make sound remote nice see one another face once while had lunches beers worked little bit well fun :) smaller news â€™s been while ps4 wouldnâ€™t boot finally took repair shop evaluation only used play rocket league (which become kinda toxic) when guests didnâ€™t interested getting fixed instead proposed exchange bricked pair joyâ€‘cons they accepted small win! towards restarted blog thatâ€™s something worth celebratingreading #â€™ve trying ditch youtube before bedtime read book instead problem depending reading get sleepy quickly takes ages anything lunch myself during week figured take kindle use time effectivethis finished reading truman capoteâ€™s classic cold blood retelling holcomb murders detailed sure least half he narrates really happen read regardless also more recent memoir how murder your life cat marnell autobiography highfunctioning drug addict working fashion publishing industry rollercoaster author herself recognizes thereâ€™s about downfall rich privileged people makes hard us look away surprisingly page turnerwatching #â€™ve watched first season el encargado ( charge) have seasons taskmaster! bear favorite episode far 7 â€œreviewâ€ watch show does immediatly main characters fall love other letâ€™s hope keeps like second seasonlistening # songs â€™ve added deezer tracks:popstar researching oblivion flotation toy warninghappiness hobo johnsonhayloft ii mother motherleft hand free altjbitch allie xelephant woman blonde redheaddna anna f grew tired many podcasts usually listen giving them break other hand binge listening books could kill loving similar vibe underunderstood which like enjoying latest episodes search engine theme song incredibly catchy)writing out looks eventful than usual november will bring!

search.title: Kerning in PowerPoint
search.text: kerning powerpoint microsoft word expects data gpos table old style kern this how make work both apps glyphs first prepare font using flattener script by mekkablue will open copy current document turn all group into glyph set some other parameters export new document somewhere ttf close file thereâ€™s need save needed anymore then extract table exported fonts xml ttx following terminal command that couple files:ttx t o somefontregularkernxml somefontregularttfttx somefontboldkernxml somefontboldttf donâ€™t like having bunch duplicate ttfs laying around trip immediately delete fontsback original glyphs file usual then time merge extracted above with final fonts command:ttx m somefontregularttf somefontregularkernxmlttx somefontboldttf somefontboldkernxmlalternatively possible via python creating empty ttfont object importing copying over something this:from fonttoolsttlib import ttfontttf_file = "somefontregularttf"kern_file "somefontregularkernxml"ttf_font ttfont(ttf_file)kern_font ttfont()kern_fontimportxml(kern_file)ttf_font["kern"] kern_font["kern"]ttf_fontsave(ttf_file) have tested stylistic sets (unencoded glyphs) which values surprisingly those works does affect powerpoint working :version 2309 365version 1678 mac
